original_text: There were weeds and thorn bushes over all the ground. The wall of stones round the field had fallen down.
korean_text: 가시덤불이 그 전부에 퍼졌으며 그 지면이 거친 풀로 덮였고 돌담이 무너져 있기로

sentences.original_text: There were weeds and thorn bushes over all the ground.
The wall of stones round the field had fallen down.
